none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 01, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
Not to be confused with LIFELOCK or LIFELÖCK, Singapore veterans LIFELOCK come off more devastating than ever on 2012's And For What EP. Blown out piercing Dis-core of the finest order, a pure mangled mess of mangel buried under walls of guitars distorted in every way imaginable. Their recent mini-tour with FRAMTID and ZYANOSE dominated my internet for a few days and made me really really want to go back to SE Asia.... AND FOR WHAT
https://lifelock.bandcamp.com/ https://lifelockcrust.bandcamp.com/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U3wUer9wZZU

seo.title: Lifelock - And For What - Terminal Escape
